title: Entity Classification Taxonomy
description: Standardized classification system for entities in the Epstein network archive

relationship.description: Classifications based on relationship to Jeffrey Epstein and network

classifications.label: Victims
classifications.description: Individuals identified as victims of trafficking or abuse

classifications.label: Co-Conspirators
classifications.description: Individuals charged or implicated as co-conspirators

classifications.label: Frequent Travelers
classifications.description: Individuals with multiple documented flights on Epstein's aircraft

classifications.label: Social Contacts
classifications.description: Individuals in Epstein's personal contact book or social circle

classifications.label: Associates
classifications.description: Business or professional associates of Epstein

classifications.label: Peripheral
classifications.description: Individuals with minimal documented connections

role.description: Classifications based on professional or functional role

classifications.label: Legal Professionals
classifications.description: Attorneys, prosecutors, defense counsel, and legal staff

classifications.label: Investigators
classifications.description: Law enforcement, FBI, investigators, and prosecutors

classifications.label: Public Figures
classifications.description: Politicians, celebrities, and other prominent individuals

classifications.label: Employees
classifications.description: Staff, pilots, assistants, and other employees

classifications.label: Media
classifications.description: Journalists, reporters, and media organizations

classifications.label: Financial
classifications.description: Financial institutions, banks, and investment firms

legal_status.description: Classifications based on legal proceedings and status

classifications.label: Plaintiffs
classifications.description: Individuals filing lawsuits or civil claims

classifications.label: Defendants
classifications.description: Individuals named as defendants in legal proceedings

classifications.label: Witnesses
classifications.description: Individuals providing testimony or depositions

classifications.label: Properties
classifications.description: Real estate owned or controlled by Epstein

classifications.label: Travel Destinations
classifications.description: Locations frequently visited via private aircraft

classifications.label: Mentioned Locations
classifications.description: Locations referenced in documents or testimony

classifications.label: Epstein Entities
classifications.description: Companies, foundations, and entities controlled by Epstein

classifications.label: Government Agencies
classifications.description: Government departments, law enforcement, and regulatory bodies

classifications.label: Law Firms
classifications.description: Legal firms involved in Epstein-related cases

classifications.label: Educational Institutions
classifications.description: Universities, schools, and academic organizations

high.description: Classification supported by multiple primary sources

medium.description: Classification supported by secondary sources or single primary source

low.description: Classification inferred from context or minimal evidence

notes: Classifications are not mutually exclusive - entities may have multiple classifications
Priority determines display order (1=highest priority, 10=lowest priority)
applies_to field restricts which entity types can receive each classification
Confidence levels should be assigned based on strength of evidence in source documents
